thread.title: France condemns coup in Burkina Faso
thread.title_full: France condemns coup in Burkina Faso | News24

author: news24.com
title: France condemns coup in Burkina Faso
text:
Paris - Former colonial power France condemned a military coup in Burkina Faso on Thursday and called for the immediate release of all those arrested and the continuation of the electoral process.
Burkina Faso's military said it had stripped interim president Michel Kafando of his functions and dissolved the government, seizing power in a coup less than a month before elections meant to restore democracy in the West African country.
"The president strongly condemns the coup d’état that has taken place in Burkina Faso," French President Francois Hollande's office said in a statement.
"He calls for the immediate liberation of all those arrested, for the interim authorities to be put back in place and for the continuation of the electoral process."
